name: Create new UpViral contacts from new rows in a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description:
This template periodically checks for new rows in a Google Sheets spreadsheet and uses the retrieved information to create new contacts in UpViral.

The template is using [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1cjqJnR0uE587hlvc05EdIMi8rO3BgDTwyUbYlayl6XM/edit?usp=sharing) Google Sheets spreadsheet as a source of the data. You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
